    • Method Detail

      • createMessagesPropertiesFilePattern

        public static Pattern createMessagesPropertiesFilePattern()
        Convenience method that calls the method #createResourceFilePattern(String, String), with parameters Constant.MESSAGES_PREFIX and Constant.MESSAGES_EXTENSION, respectively.
        Returns:
        a Pattern that matches the Messages.properties files of different Locales
        Since:
        2.4.0
        See Also:
        createResourceFilesPattern(String, String), Constant.MESSAGES_PREFIX, Constant.MESSAGES_EXTENSION

      • createResourceFilesRegex

        public static String createResourceFilesRegex(String fileName,
                              String fileExtension)
        Returns a regular expression to match source and translated resource filenames with the given fileName and fileExtension.

        For example, with fileName as "Messages" and fileExtension as ".properties" the returned pattern would match:

        • Messages.properties
        • Messages_en.properties
        • Messages_en_GB.properties
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the resource files
        fileExtension - the extension of the resource files
        Returns:
        the regular expression to match resource filenames
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given fileName or fileExtension is null.
        Since:
        2.4.0
        See Also:
        createResourceFilesPattern(String, String), LANGUAGE_LOCALE_REGEX, COUNTRY_LOCALE_REGEX

      • createResourceFilesPattern

        public static Pattern createResourceFilesPattern(String fileName,
                                 String fileExtension)
        Returns a Pattern to match source and translated resource filenames with the given fileName and fileExtension.

        For example, with fileName as "Messages" and fileExtension as ".properties" the returned pattern would match:

        • Messages.properties
        • Messages_en.properties
        • Messages_en_GB.properties

        The pattern is case-sensitive.

        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the resource files
        fileExtension - the extension of the resource files
        Returns:
        the Pattern to match resource filenames
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given fileName or fileExtension is null.
        Since:
        2.4.0
        See Also:
        createResourceFilesRegex(String, String), LANGUAGE_LOCALE_REGEX, COUNTRY_LOCALE_REGEX

      • getAvailableLocales

        public static List<String> getAvailableLocales()
        Returns a list of languages and countries of the Locales (as String, for example "en_GB"), of default language and available translations.

        The list is sorted by language/country codes with default locale, always, at first position.

        Returns:
        The list of available translations, ZAP provides

      • getViewLocale

        public static ViewLocale getViewLocale(String locale)
        Convenience method that creates a ViewLocale with the given locale and a display name created by calling getLocalDisplayName(String), with the locale as argument.
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale that will used to create the ViewLocale
        Returns:
        the ViewLocale for the given locale
        Since:
        2.4.0
        See Also:
        getLocalDisplayName(String)

      • getAvailableViewLocales

        public static List<ViewLocale> getAvailableViewLocales()
        Returns a list of ViewLocales, sorted by display name, of the default language and available translations.
        Returns:
        the ViewLocales of the default language and available translations.
        Since:
        2.4.0
        See Also:
        ViewLocale

      • getLocalDisplayName

        public static String getLocalDisplayName(String locale)
        Parameters:
        locale -
        Returns:
        the name of the language
